title: 93/317/EEC: Commission Decision of 21 April 1993 concerning the content of the code to be used on bovine ear marks
header:
COMMISSION DECISION of 21 April 1993 concerning the content of the code to be used on bovine ear marks
(93/317/EEC)THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: This Decision is addressed to the Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 21 April 1993.
For the Commission
RenĂŠ STEICHEN
Member of the Commission
(1) OJ No L 355, 5. 12. 1992, p. 32.
